page.title: 07SUPERNATURAL
page.content: At Hollymount farm strange things have happened.There was a rumour of a tomb being found whilst digging the foundations for a shed for cows.The owner found the tomb of James Elton who was buried in the 16th Century. There is also a rumour about a tunnel from Hollymount farm to Brandlesholme Hall. The ghost of Walshaw Hall appears when there is a smell of mushrooms. Usually it is in the computer room.The computer room is not its original size because part of the room has been walled off, and no-one can get in (or out! )
